snippet.title: Nimbatus - Drone Creator Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
We decided to release the drone editor from Nimbatus - The Space Drone Constructor as a separate free game on Steam!

You can play it for free here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1243130/Nimbatus__Drone_Creator/

There will be quite a few building competitions going on where you can use the Drone Creator to participate and try to win a key for the full game :)
(Check our Twitter and/or forums for more infos)
